chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro is having the following issue:

Hello, my phone got stolen and when I'm leaving to report it at the police station, they asked me for the IMEI number 2 and I only have the first one, please consider my request.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

Concerning the order placed with you on our site, the customer comes back to us and sends us this message for you:

[My phone was stolen and when I went to the police to report it, they asked me for IMEI 2 (IMEI: 353742334249216) and I only have the first, thank you for taking my request into consideration.]

How can we help him in such a situation?
Please get back to us upon receipt of this message.

Paul from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

The IMEI2 for the device is 353742333817914. Please inform the customer accordingly.

Regards,
SY
